primary-section.heading-1: Discover the power of partnership with one of the biggest betting company in the world!
primary-section.text-1: Do you have an entrepreneurial spirit and seek new income opportunities?
primary-section.text-2: Accept payments, top up accounts, send withdrawals and receive a well-deserved rewards up to 3-5% for deposits and up to 2% for withdrawals!

looking-section.heading: What we’re looking for
looking-section.text-3: Citizenship of the country where you intend to work
looking-section.text-4: Stay in touch with our team during work
looking-section.text-5: Choose startup capital on your own
looking-section.text-6: Take responsibility for the quality of your work
looking-section.text-7:
After all, what could be better than not only using our platform for entertainment, 
but also generate a good income by becoming a part of our team as a payment agent!

partners-section.text-1: Here, at 1xBET, we've redefined the online betting industry with our innovative platform that offers sports betting, casino games, live dealer options, and more.
partners-section.text-2: With millions of satisfied customers, we are a trusted name in the industry.

slider-section.heading: Partnering with 1XBET, you are partnering with the BEST
slider-section.slider-1-text: Access a diverse and international customer base through 1XBET's platform
slider-section.slider-2-text: Enjoy the potential for mutually beneficial financial partnerships
slider-section.slider-3-text: Leverage 1XBET's years of experience and established reputation in the online betting industry
slider-section.slider-4-text: Access cutting-edge payment integration solutions for seamless transactions

support-section.heading: Need a best friend at work? Right on!
support-section.subtitle: At our company, we understand the importance of a smooth onboarding process for our new team members.
support-section.text-1: That's why we provide 24-hour support to ensure that our team members have a resource they can turn to for assistance at any time.
support-section.text-2: Whether it's a query about company policies, technical issues, or general guidance, our dedicated support team is always just a message away, day or night.

way-section.heading: Why start with us?
way-section.subtitle: Our platform empowers you to:
way-section.text-1: Team up with your friends and reach the goals together!
way-section.text-2:
Extend your business to new regions 
and attract a fresh wave of customers!
way-section.text-3: Work with user-friendly platform that's accessible in multiple languages for efficient operations and streamlined workflows!
way-section.text-4:
Receive deposits and fund 
customers' accounts!
way-section.text-5-content:
Jungles, beaches, mountains or a comfort of a chair at your own home? 
Anything can become your office, you just need to have a device and a stable Internet!
way-section.text-5-heading: But the best news is? You can work from anywhere in the world!
